title: Incoherent
review: It is breath-grasping in the first 20 minutes. Then passed 40 minutes of boredom and unrelated plot. The horror-inducing factor in the movie is incoherent thoughtout the movie. And the laying out of evidence and deduction is not well distributed. I don't feel immersed in the story because the movie didn't not leak or cascade horror in the incremental manner. I feel disorented where the movie is going. Not too bad I can say that but not worth going to the cinema if you have t bought the ticket.
